a.n: FLAVOURS OF GREECE - ATHENS, THE CYCLADES AND KALYMNOS

p.k: Starting in the capital city of Athens, Charlie checks out the new Acropolis museum before heading out to the Cyclades and Sporades Islands. In this archipelagic episode we join the sponge divers of Kalymnos for a journey to the bottom of the sea where Charlie enjoys underwater canapés. Next it’s off to bask on the black sands of Santorini before finishing our journey on the uber chic party island of Mykonos.
